Contact Iowa CYP

Reach the team that walks alongside Iowa Guard families

Send a note for event help, school support, partnership ideas, or anything family-related. We’ll route your message to the teammate who can respond fastest.

Email the team

General contact

We’re a call or message away

Email: iaarngcyp@gmail.com

Phone: 515-252-4050

We reply within two business days. Need help right now? Call the Iowa National Guard Warrior & Family Services office.

Visit us

Camp Dodge, Johnston

Camp Dodge Rec Hall - 7105 NW 78th Ave Bldg 3585, Johnston IA 50131

We’re beside the Iowa Gold Star Military Museum inside Camp Dodge. Bring a valid ID for gate access.

Meet your points of contact

Connect directly with program leads across Iowa

Each teammate below covers specific regions or specialties. Reach out to the person closest to your family or request a warm handoff.

Chris Cox

Lead Child & Youth Program Coordinator

JTSI Contractor

Chris Cox leads the Iowa Army National Guard Child & Youth Program. He grew up in a Guard family and knows firsthand how much encouragement matters. Chris loves building experiences where military-connected youth can be themselves, learn new skills, and feel proud of the role they play at home.

Email: christopher.j.cox18.ctr@army.mil

Phone: 515-727-3064

Facebook Instagram

Erin Coogler

Child & Youth Program Coordinator

JTSI Contractor

Erin Coogler is a Program Coordinator who brings a child-development background and a big heart for Guard families. She designs camps, kits, and trainings that feel welcoming, practical, and fun—so every young person walks away more confident and connected.

Email: iaarngcyp@gmail.com

Phone: 515-252-4050

Facebook Instagram
